sentences.sContent: You're begging the question-well hang on a second why should I believe capital punishment is wrong on the bases of these two premises I don't accept that one at all because you're just assuming.
sentences.sContent_eng: You're begging the question-well hang on a second why should I believe capital punishment is wrong on the bases of these two premises I don't accept that one at all because you're just assuming.
sentences.sCn: 你们在求问题，等等,为什么我应该相信死刑是错的,在这两个前提的基础上,我不接受其中的一个，因为你只是假设。
